description: medium tan ground; two rectangular areas of design--one with central band of repeating diamonds with dark brown and light tan grids through center and similar bands with repeating triangles with smaller triangles inside flanking diamond band; second larger design area has diamonds with various designs--broken into triangles filled with grids, divided into smaller geometric shapes--in dark brown, two shades of medium brown and tan; received framed, unglazed
title: Panel
